<TextStyle.Yellow>Thank you for joining this server! You can join our discord by clicking the Discord button below!



SETTINGS:


- Harvest: x25

- Taming: x100

- Tribe Limit: 4 man

- Collision: Disabled

- Custom Drops

- Custom Craft

- Bushberry System for Bosses

- Active Staffs

- Ingame Shop</>
